name: Grilled Steak
description: Our perfectly grilled steak is a carnivore's delight, cooked to perfection and bursting with smoky flavors.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
description: Indulge in a creamy garlic butter shrimp pasta that's a symphony of flavors, combining succulent shrimp with rich, comforting sauce.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Experience the essence of Italy with our Margherita pizza, where simplicity meets taste with sun-ripened tomatoes, fresh basil, and melted mozzarella.

name: Spicy Thai Curry
description: Our Spicy Thai Curry is a flavorful journey to Southeast Asia, with vibrant spices and coconut milk, creating a balanced heat and flavor.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Indulge in a decadent Chocolate Lava Cake, revealing a molten center of pure, rich chocolate.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Our Caprese salad is a celebration of simplicity, with vine-ripened tomatoes, creamy mozzarella, and a drizzle of olive oil and balsamic reduction.

name: Crispy Fried Chicken
description: Get ready for a flavor explosion with our Crispy Fried Chicken, featuring crispy, golden-brown skin and juicy, seasoned meat.

name: Mouthwatering BBQ Ribs
description: Our BBQ ribs are fall-off-the-bone tender, slow-cooked to perfection, and generously coated in our signature BBQ sauce.

name: Mango Salsa Fish Tacos
description: Enjoy tropical flavors with our Mango Salsa Fish Tacos, featuring crispy fish and a zesty mango salsa.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: For a healthier option, try our Vegetable Stir-Fry, with crisp and colorful veggies in a savory stir-fry sauce.
